item.title: Price of mont-bell products
item.description: I bought the following from mont-bell. The three prices are the Japanese price on the tag, the price I paid for the US mont-bell operation, and the the Japanese price in dollors as of 10⁄28 20:36 EST. chameece muffler ¥1100 $10.40 $9.79 mini clear bottle 20ml ¥260 $2.7 $2.31 cotton twill hat L ¥2200 $17.50 $19.58 cable knit work cap ¥2762 $31 $24.58 breeze spun hunting cap ¥2500 $29 $22.25

item.title: 欲しいものリスト
